Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The terrible arachnens from Arachnaea's habitat are multiplying faster than we can allow.

Eliminate the {@LinkCreature:39#160#dreadfang arachnens} and {@LinkCreature:39#280#arachnen devastators}.

Report to Esrill when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
